articles.title: WWE RAW 7/15/2024: 3 Things We Hated And 3 Things We Loved - Wrestling Inc.
articles.description: On a night that saw Erick Rowan make basically everyone cry, here are three things we hated and three things we loved about the 7/15/24 episode of &#34;WWE Raw.&#34;
articles.content: Over the last few weeks, Nikki Cross has provided VHS tapes to Pat McAfee and Michael Cole that featured emotional conversations with Bo Dallas and Uncle Howdy. I've been hoping that the tapes would … [+2040 chars]
